awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Research Proposal in Representation  Theory
awd_abstract_narration: This award supports research on the representation theory of               Lie algebras.  The principal investigator will continue work on                 the Lie cohomology of some vector fields algebras.  He will also                consider the modular representations of Kac-Moody algebras at the               critical level.                                                                      This research is concerned with a mathematical object called               a Lie algebra.  Lie algebras arise from another object called a                 Lie group.  An example of a Lie group is the rotations of a                     sphere where one rotation is followed by another.  Lie groups and               Lie algebras are important in areas involving analysis of                       spherical motion.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
